description: Factory with implementation address in CREATE2 salt for version-specific account addresses

P256AccountFactory.note: Vanity address with 0x000000 prefix - requires --legacy flag for deployment

changes: Modified _computeSalt() to include implementation address in CREATE2 salt
Different contract versions now get different account addresses
Allows reusing same salt (index 0) during development when contract code changes
Account address is independent of passkey (qx, qy) and 2FA settings
notes: This deployment uses a vanity address with 0x000000 prefix
The salt calculation now includes the implementation address
Frontend .env files updated with new factory address
Deployment requires --legacy flag: forge script script/Deploy.s.sol:DeployScript --rpc-url $SEPOLIA_RPC_URL --broadcast --legacy
The --legacy flag uses legacy optimizer settings which produce different bytecode
IMPORTANT: Must use raw CREATE2 from deployer address, not Foundry's CREATE2 deployer
Foundry intercepts CREATE2 calls and routes them through 0x4e59b44847b379578588920cA78FbF26c0B4956C
To deploy with vanity address, need to use raw transaction or different deployment method
